title: Veer Fancy Type
content:
Anyone know what this font is [http://www.veer.com/images/merch/VPR0001170\_P3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015603/http:/www.veer.com/images/merch/VPR0001170_P3.jpg "http://www.veer.com/images/merch/VPR0001170\_P3.jpg")  
If it’s a custom typeface, do you know of any that are similar?

 [‹ Typophile Forum header face](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015603/http:/www.typophile.com/node/12114 "Go to previous forum topic") [Armani font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015603/http:/www.typophile.com/node/10606 "Go to next forum topic")
author: voiceof

comments.content: It’s a custom wordmark by one of our own in-house designers. It was loosely based on parts of Jonathan Barnbrook’s [Expletive Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104015603/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=VIT0000007).

Oh damn, Well it looks good

Thanks
